longInfo:
Passport required.  
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Monaco must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of Monaco.
  

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days(SEE NOTE
53555):
    NOTE 53555: The max. stay is granted within 180 days.
 - for nationals of Monaco; 
Additional Information:
- Extension of stay possible for visitors who are visa exempt
  for a max. stay of 90 days. Fee: LTL 60.-
